risk_description: Mobile OS aggressive background process killing causing interruptions to real-time technician location tracking (iOS/Android constraints).
root_cause: Native OS battery optimization strategies kill background JavaScript threads in React Native apps.
mitigation_strategy: Implement native modules (Java/Kotlin/Swift) for the location service foreground process; configure 'Always' permission requests correctly; implement heartbeat mechanism.
contingency_plan: Fallback to 'significant location change' API (lower fidelity) or SMS-based location pings if WebSocket connection fails.
monitoring_trigger: Location update gaps exceeding 60 seconds for active technicians.

risk_description: Data synchronization conflicts in WatermelonDB (Offline-First) resulting in data loss or overwrites when technicians reconnect.
root_cause: Last-Write-Wins strategy specified in requirements may overwrite critical server-side updates made by dispatchers while technician was offline.
mitigation_strategy: Implement differential synchronization; version backend entities; create conflict resolution UI for critical fields rather than silent overwrites.
contingency_plan: Implement rigorous audit logging of sync conflicts to allow manual data restoration by admins.
monitoring_trigger: Sync error rate > 1% in application logs.

risk_description: PostGIS geospatial query latency exceeding 250ms SLA under high concurrent load during routing calculations.
root_cause: Complex point-in-polygon queries on unoptimized geometry columns without proper GIST indexing.
mitigation_strategy: Enforce GIST indexing on all geometry columns; offload read-heavy spatial queries to read replicas; implement Redis geospatial caching for active technician locations.
contingency_plan: Simplify polygon geometries (reduce vertices) using ST_Simplify to improve query performance.
monitoring_trigger: Database query latency for spatial operations exceeding 100ms.

risk_description: Node.js Event Loop blocking due to CPU-intensive operations (OCR processing, Crypto) causing API latency spikes.
root_cause: Single-threaded nature of Node.js processing synchronous heavy workloads on the main thread.
mitigation_strategy: Offload OCR and Crypto tasks to worker threads or separate microservices (Azure Functions); strictly enforce async polling patterns.
contingency_plan: Scale out API pods horizontally via HPA if CPU saturation occurs on specific nodes.
monitoring_trigger: Event loop lag metrics > 20ms in Application Insights.

risk_description: Azure AD B2C custom policy complexity delays authentication delivery and role mapping.
root_cause: Steep learning curve and XML configuration complexity of Identity Experience Framework for custom claims.
mitigation_strategy: Engage identity specialist early; prototype custom policies immediately; use Terraform to manage B2C configuration where possible.
contingency_plan: Revert to standard user flows temporarily, managing complex roles within the app DB instead of tokens.
monitoring_trigger: Authentication failure rates or delay in dev environment setup.

risk_description: Failure to meet WCAG 2.1 Level AA accessibility standards for complex Mapbox interactions.
root_cause: Canvas-based map rendering (WebGL) is inherently difficult to expose to screen readers.
mitigation_strategy: Implement a parallel 'list view' or 'text-based' representation of map data; ensure all map controls have ARIA labels.
contingency_plan: Engage external accessibility audit firm for remediation prior to launch.
monitoring_trigger: axe-core automated test failures in CI pipeline.
